articles.title: Sandra Bullock, 58, is seen for the first time at an event in ONE YEAR - Daily Mail
articles.description: Sandra Bullock does not hit events that often - her last red carpet appearance was in March for The Lost City. But she was spotted at a CAA event this weekend with Demi Moore.
